�Hedge�         �Sniper�         �Pyrotic�         �Ostick�         �Sqril�  
         �Ga-ga-bot�        �Thug-bot�


   Only a few seconds past since Part 3.  Everyone is where they were 
before.

   "Turn on the Camera back there to the bomb." Hedge says.

   "Right away, " Sniper says.

   A screen near the front shows the engine room.  The camera zooms in on 
the bomb.  The timer on the bomb is at 16 seconds.

   "Slag, Okay when we land, I want Sniper to scan for frequincies.  Sqril 
and Ga-ga-bot to put up our defenses.  osticks and Thug-bot to put out the 
fir and try to repair the engine.  Pyrotic, you will command the bridge.  
Sniper, when you find thoese frquincies, send them to me in my room."  Hedge 
says as she walks calmly to her room.

   The 16 seconds run out and the bomb go boom.  The ship falls and crashes 
near Delhi, India.
